title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press the 'Finish' button, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: The JAR packager fails to create the JAR file when there are unsaved editors open.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file even if there are unsaved editors open. If there are unsaved editors, there should be a dialog prompting me to save them before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Enter all the required fields.
3. Leave some editors unsaved.
4. Press the 'Finish' button.
5. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
